title: LF Gold/plat ADC's
body: I wanna find some good partners which always make it more fun :) I main sup, If i don't know the adc i tend to play ranged supports for obvious reasons :P Looking to get plat ez and hopefully diamond :) Play a lot of ranged AP champs atm but can play melee too

replies.body: Hey mate add me on league adc main G3 atm climbing to diamond hopefully
